app.components.CreateBallotPage.createDe: To ensure tickets cannot be counterfeited, Ballot uses 2048-bit ring signature algorithm, of which parameters need several seconds or minutes to calculate. Please wait patiently during the process. Besides, to avoid fraud, once created, a ballot cannot be modified or deleted.
app.components.EditFieldsPage.deleteDesc: This cannot be undone except withdrawing all the changes you have made since last save.
app.components.EditFieldsPage.dropDescri: This cannot be undone. All changes since last save will gone.
app.components.HomePage.name: Name
app.components.PasswordField.label: Password
app.components.PreVotingPage.signDescrip: This operation will NOT cause private key being sent to remote server. Instead, all operation will be done locally. However, due to the heavy computation load, it may take several minutes to successfully calcuate the signature. Please do wait patiently.
app.components.RegisterForm.description: Not yet have an organizer account? Sign up here to create a new ballot.
app.components.Snackbar.changePassword: Your password has been successfully changed.
app.components.Snackbar.createBallot: New ballot {name} has been successfully created. Please wait patiently during the initialization process.
app.components.Snackbar.inviting: Ballot {name} successfully initialized and ready for inviting voters.
app.components.UsernameField.helperText: At least 5 alphanumeric or dash characters.
app.components.UsernameField.label: Username
app.components.ViewBallotPage.finalizeFi: This cannot be undone. Once pre-voting starts, you cannot edit ticket fields. Besides, tickets fields will become public and available to anyone.
app.components.ViewBallotPage.finalizePr: This cannot be undone. To better protect anonymity of voters, it is recommended that voting should start after all voters have pre-voted. It is also recommended that the duration of voting should be as short as possible.
app.components.ViewBallotPage.finalizeVo: This cannot be undone. Once invitation finished, unregistered voters will be immediately removed. You can no longer add or delete voters, either. Besides, voter list will become public and available to anyone.
This cannot be undone. Once voting is finished, any following ticket submission will be declined. Besides, tickets submitted but not yet verified will NOT be accepted, either.
app.components.VoterCard.deleteDescripti: This cannot be undone. Voters who are registered will be immediately unregistered upon deletion.
app.components.VoterRegPage.registerDesc: This cannot be undone. Your private key will only appear ONCE, which will later be used during pre-voting phase. Thus, make sure to store it in an absolutely secure place.
app.error.fdmf: Field malformed. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.netw: Network error. Check network connectivity and try to refresh the page.
app.error.nmmf: Name malformed. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.nopk: No public key matching your private key. Please check your private key.
app.error.ntfd: Resource not found. Check the URL and try to refresh the page.
app.error.pkmf: Public key malformed. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.pwmf: Password malformed. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.rpic: Ring parameter incorrect. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.stna: Ballot status has changed. Please refresh the page.
app.error.tmrq: Requests are too frequent. Please try later.
app.error.tpns: Field type not supported. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.uath: Login required. Please login again since a long period of time has passed since last login.
app.error.unknown: Unknown error. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.unmf: Username malformed. Please report the problem to system admin.
app.error.vtrg: The invitation code has already been taken. Please contact the organizer.
app.validation.minChar: At least {m, number} {m, plural, one {character} other {characters}}
